verses.verse: And a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G3708>appeared<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> with the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> and the <S%G4582>moon<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> her <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and on her <S%G2776>head<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G792>stars;<s%>
and she was with <S%G1722>child<s%><S%G1064>;<s%> and she <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G2192>being<s%> in <S%G5605>labor<s%> and in <S%G928>pain<s%> to <S%G5088>give<s%> <S%G5088>birth.<s%>

And <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G3708>appeared<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4450>red<s%> <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> and <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns,<s%> and on his <S%G2776>heads<s%> [were] <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1238>diadems.<s%>

And his <S%G3769>tail<s%> <S%G4951>swept<s%> <S%G4951>away<s%> a <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G792>stars<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G906>threw<s%> them to the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> And the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> who was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G5088>give<s%> <S%G5088>birth,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3752>when<s%> she <S%G5088>gave<s%> <S%G5088>birth<s%> he might <S%G2719>devour<s%> her <S%G5043>child.<s%>

And she <S%G5088>gave<s%> <S%G5088>birth<s%> to a <S%G5207>son,<s%> a <S%G7021>male<s%> <S%G5043>[child<s%>], <S%G3739>who<s%> is to <S%G4165>rule<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> with a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron;<s%> and her child was <S%G726>caught<s%> up to <S%G2316>God<s%> and to His <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> into the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> she <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> by <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G1563>there<s%> she might be <S%G5142>nourished<s%> for <S%G5507>one<s%> <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> and <S%G1835>sixty<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

And there was <S%G4171>war<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3413>Michael<s%> and his <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4170>waging<s%> <S%G4170>war<s%> with the <S%G1404>dragon.<s%> And the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> and his <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4170>waged<s%> <S%G4170>war,<s%>
and they were not <S%G2480>strong<s%> <S%G2480>enough,<s%> and there was <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> for them in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1404>dragon<s%> was <S%G906>thrown<s%> down, the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> of <S%G744>old<s%> who is <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> and <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> who <S%G4105>deceives<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world;<s%> he was <S%G906>thrown<s%> down to the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and his <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G906>thrown<s%> down with him.

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G737>"Now<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> and the <S%G1411>power,<s%> and the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of our <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G1849>authority<s%> of His <S%G5547>Christ<s%> have <S%G1096>come,<s%> for the <S%G2725>accuser<s%> of our <S%G80>brethren<s%> has been <S%G906>thrown<s%> down, who <S%G2723>accuses<s%> them <S%G1799>before<s%> our <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night.<s%>

"And they <S%G3528>overcame<s%> him <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> of their <S%G3141>testimony,<s%> and they did not <S%G25>love<s%> their <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G891>even<s%> to <S%G2288>death.<s%>

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason,<s%> <S%G2165>rejoice,<s%> O <S%G3772>heavens<s%> and you who <S%G4637>dwell<s%> in them. <S%G3759>Woe<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> has <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to you, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that he <S%G2192>has<s%> [only] a <S%G3641>short<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>"

And <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> that he was <S%G906>thrown<s%> down to the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> he <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G5088>gave<s%> <S%G5088>birth<s%> to the <S%G7021>male<s%> [child.]

And the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G105>eagle<s%> were <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that she might <S%G4072>fly<s%> into the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to her <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> she was <S%G5142>nourished<s%> for a <S%G2540>time<s%> and <S%G2540>times<s%> and <S%G2255>half<s%> a <S%G2540>time,<s%> from the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of the <S%G3789>serpent.<s%>

And the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> <S%G906>poured<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G4215>river<s%> out of his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that he might <S%G4160>cause<s%> her to be <S%G4216>swept<s%> <S%G4216>away<s%> with the <S%G4216>flood.<s%>

And the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G997>helped<s%> the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> its <S%G4750>mouth<s%> and <S%G2666>drank<s%> up the <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G906>poured<s%> out of his <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

And the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> was <S%G3710>enraged<s%> with the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>off<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> with the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of her <S%G4690>offspring,<s%> who <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G2192>hold<s%> to the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
